bike.description: Reynolds 520 double-butted chromoly main tubes with SST tubing diameters, double-tapered cromo stays, extended head tube with reinforced collars, forged dropouts with double eyelets and spoke carrier

components.description: Lugged semi-sloping chromoly with canti bosses, low-rider carrier braze-ons, forged dropout with double eyelets
Alex ACE19 eyeleted double walled rims, 36H, Shimano Tiagra 4500 hubs with QR and 14g stainless steel spokes
Vittoria Randonneur with Double Shielding puncture protection and reflective sidewalls, 700 x 32c
Shimano Tiagra RD-4600GS rear and Sora FD-3503 front with 28.6mm alloy clamp
microSHIFT bar end shifters with index or friction option, 27-Speed
Touring platform, full alloy cage & body with toe clips
Tektro 992 forged alloy cantilevers with Tektro RL340 road brake lever
Jamis adjustable threadless system (ATS) forged aluminum stem, 10JAMIS_DEGREE x 90mm (47/50), 105mm (53/55), 115mm (57/59/62). ATS shim length 100mm
Jamis alloy micro-adjust, 27.2 x 300mm with cromo seat pin
Jamis Touring Sport with pressure relief cut-out and satin steel rails
Full coverage fenders with adjustable stays and new designed mud flaps, Jamis carrier (capacity 18kg/40lbs.) with Jamis logo strap and rear reflector
